summary: How does the U.S. military evaluate active duty officers and decide who gets promoted? The military services evaluate officer performance using their own performance evaluation systems. Performance information is used for promotion decisions and can help officers with career development. title: Military Officer Performance: Actions Needed to Fully Incorporate Performance Evaluation Key Practices
